title: Easeout Weekly #8
body:
![Crystal Ball Animation](/images/uploads/animation-code-tips.png) [Tips for Writing Animation Code Efficiently](https://css-tricks.com/tips-for-writing-animation-code-efficiently/) A wonderful resource by Zach Saucier for writing animation code using GSAP. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/tips-for-writing-animation-code-efficiently/)
![The React Hooks API Guide](/images/uploads/react-hooks-api-guide.png) [Getting Started With The React Hooks API](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/react-hooks-api-guide/) A tutorial covering the basics of react hooks, including the newer hooks shipped with React 16.8. Also a neat section on writing your own custom hooks. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/react-hooks-api-guide/)
![Synthwave Art Scene](/images/uploads/synthwave-art-scene.png) [Synthwave Art Scenes by Denny Busyet](https://abduzeedo.com/synthwave-art-scenes-denny-busyet) Some 80s/90s Nostalgia from Denny Busyet! [Read it ➡️](https://abduzeedo.com/synthwave-art-scenes-denny-busyet)
![Stack Overflow Dark Mode Landing](/images/uploads/stackoverflow-darkmode.png) [Building Dark Mode on Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.blog/2020/03/31/building-dark-mode-on-stack-overflow/) On March 30, 2020, Stack Overflow enabled an opt in for a beta dark mode. This article looks at the work that went into making it happen. [Read it ➡️](https://stackoverflow.blog/2020/03/31/building-dark-mode-on-stack-overflow/)
![UX Logo In Pandemic](/images/uploads/helpful-ux-in-a-pandemic.png) [How to be useful as a UX designer in pandemic](https://uxdesign.cc/how-to-be-useful-as-a-ux-designer-in-pandemic-c2d355614b24) This article lists a number of ways that UX designers can help in a pandemic. [Read it ➡️](https://uxdesign.cc/how-to-be-useful-as-a-ux-designer-in-pandemic-c2d355614b24)
![Finger above Push Button](/images/uploads/push-api-button.png) [Creating Scheduled Push Notifications](https://css-tricks.com/creating-scheduled-push-notifications/) A handy guide to scheduling push notifications using service workers. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/creating-scheduled-push-notifications/)
![Smashing Podcast Logo](/images/uploads/smashing-podcast-13.png) [Smashing Podcast with Laura Kalbag: What Is Online Privacy?](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/smashing-podcast-episode-13/) This episode of the Smashing Podcast is all about online privacy. What should web developers be doing to make sure the privacy of they're users is maintained? Drew McLellan talks with Laura Kalbag, to find out. [Listen up ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/smashing-podcast-episode-13/)
![Nifty Netflix Logo](/images/uploads/netflix-carousel.png) [How to Re-Create a Nifty Netflix Animation in CSS](https://css-tricks.com/how-to-re-create-a-nifty-netflix-animation-in-css/) How to code the famous Netflix UI hover. No JavaScript. No dependencies. Just Plain CSS! [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/how-to-re-create-a-nifty-netflix-animation-in-css/)
![A Grid of Logos in Squares](/images/uploads/grid-logos-in-squares.png) [A Grid of Logos in Squares](https://css-tricks.com/a-grid-of-logos-in-squares/) A nice demo on using CSS grid to make a layout of squares containing responsive logos. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/a-grid-of-logos-in-squares/)
![WordPress and GitHub Actions Logos](/images/uploads/github-actions-wordpress.png) [Continuous Deployments for WordPress Using GitHub Actions](https://css-tricks.com/continuous-deployments-for-wordpress-using-github-actions/) This tutorial guides you through deploying your WordPress theme to a server using GitHub Actions. The workflow file created can easily be reused for future projects, making continuous deployment setups a breeze. [Read it ➡️](https://css-tricks.com/continuous-deployments-for-wordpress-using-github-actions/)
![Building Browser Features Podcast](/images/uploads/building-browser-features.png) [Building Browser Features with Brian Kardell ](https://shoptalkshow.com/407/) Brian Kardell talks about how new features get into browsers and the fun and challenging journey it takes to get there. [Listen up ➡️](https://shoptalkshow.com/407/)
![Free Developer Blog Using Hugo And Firebase Signup](/images/uploads/hugo-2-firebase-project-creation.png) [Create Your Free Developer Blog Using Hugo And Firebase](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/free-developer-blog-hugo-firebase/) This article looks at how to deploy a blog for free and with minimal effort using Hugo and Firebase. [Read it ➡️](https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/04/free-developer-blog-hugo-firebase/)
## Previous Issue: * [Easeout Weekly #7](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-04-easeout-weekly-7)
short: A weekly roundup of the latest web design & development news.
